snippet: An annual dance festival celebrates the choreography native to the many cultures that have become American.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews dancers performing on second weekend of San Francisco Festival of Ethnic Dance, at Palace of Fine Arts Theater.
lead_paragraph: An annual dance festival celebrates the choreography native to the many cultures that have become American.

headline.main: Review: Ethnic Festival Dancers Follow the Footsteps of a Heritage
headline.print_headline: Embracing the Globe From Tip to Toe
